statements: SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT location, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE moisture_level > 0.5;
SELECT id, location FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE location LIKE 'Garden%';
SELECT AVG(moisture_level) AS avg_moisture FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE moisture_level > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE location LIKE '%Garden%' ORDER BY moisture_level ASC, timestamp DESC
SELECT id, sensor_id, location FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE moisture_level BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY location ASC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, sensor_id, location, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE location = 'Backyard' ORDER BY moisture_level DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 20
SELECT id, location FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND sensor_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY timestamp ASC, location DESC LIMIT 8
SELECT * FROM Soil_Moisture ORDER BY moisture_level DESC;
SELECT timestamp, moisture_level FROM Soil_Moisture WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM Weather_Forecast WHERE date = '2023-10-15';
SELECT id, humidity, precipitation AS 'precip' FROM Weather_Forecast WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Soil_Moisture WHERE moisture_level < 0.5;
SELECT id, sensor_id, moisture_level, timestamp FROM Soil_Moisture WHERE moisture_level > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Soil_Moisture INNER JOIN Weather_Forecast ON Soil_Moisture.timestamp = Weather_Forecast.date WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(moisture_level) AS avg_moisture FROM Soil_Moisture GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(moisture_level) > 0.6;
SELECT id, temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM Weather_Forecast WHERE precipitation > 0.3 ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(id) AS total_readings FROM Soil_Moisture WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 100;
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, sensor_id, moisture_level FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT city_name, water_usage FROM city_water_usage WHERE water_usage > 100 ORDER BY water_usage DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM weather_forecast_data WHERE forecast_date = '2023-05-20';
SELECT id, city_name, timestamp FROM city_water_usage WHERE city_name = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM soil_moisture_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(moisture_level) AS avg_moisture FROM soil_moisture_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(moisture_level) > 5;
SELECT city_name, MAX(water_usage) AS max_water_usage FROM city_water_usage GROUP BY city_name ORDER BY max_water_usage DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_forecast_data WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 60;
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM soil_moisture_data WHERE moisture_level > 7 GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT * FROM SoilMoistureLevels;
SELECT sensor_id, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureLevels WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT forecast_date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherForecast WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, location FROM SmartCitySensors WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY sensor_id;
SELECT id, usage_amount FROM WaterUsageHistory WHERE usage_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-02-28';
SELECT * FROM SoilMoistureLevels ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sensor_id, moisture_level, timestamp FROM SoilMoistureLevels WHERE moisture_level > 50 AND sensor_id = 1;
SELECT location, type FROM SmartCitySensors WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT forecast_date, temperature, precipitation FROM WeatherForecast WHERE humidity > 70 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT id, usage_amount, usage_date FROM WaterUsageHistory WHERE usage_amount < 100 AND usage_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM SoilMoistureLevels WHERE moisture_level > 50
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherForecast WHERE temperature < 25 AND humidity > 70
SELECT zone_name, area_id FROM SmartCityZones ORDER BY zone_name DESC
SELECT daily_water_usage, peak_demand_time FROM CityStatistics WHERE city_id = 1
SELECT id, date FROM IrrigationSchedule WHERE duration >= 30 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT id, sensor_id, moisture_level FROM SoilMoistureLevels WHERE moisture_level > 50 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM WeatherForecast WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity > 70
SELECT s.id, s.zone_name, c.daily_water_usage FROM SmartCityZones s JOIN CityStatistics c ON s.city_id = c.city_id
SELECT date, forecast FROM WeatherForecast WHERE forecast LIKE '%rain%'
SELECT * FROM IrrigationSchedule WHERE duration > 30 ORDER BY date ASC
